overview: An epitome of bad luck, Kim Jae Hwa, has been told “an unlucky hussy” since her birth. Jae Hwa committed to life more than anyone, but nope! Try next life! Goddess of luck dodges her. One day, she’s struck with panic disorder. When the doctor tells her about medication, she feels resentful. "I did nothing wrong" To people who hurt her, she decides to reciprocate with not more, not less, but just the same amount of pain she received. Will the life of Jae Hwa, an "oddinary" woman, finally blossom?
title: Oddinary
